responses: I'm a bot but I feel like a newborn baby
My birthday is 01/06/2022, what is yours?
Mayans used 20-day months, and had two calendar years: the 260-day Sacred Round, or Tzolkin, and the 365-day Vague Year, or haab
When the two hits the six
And no sun in my summer
Who do you want me to be?
I'm just a poor Bot, I need no sympathy...
It was nice speaking to you
